highPrecision - 类 中的变量com.google.android.filament.View.VsmShadowOptions
Whether to use a 32-bits or 16-bits texture format for VSM shadow maps. 32-bits precision is rarely needed, but it does reduces light leaks as well as "fading" of the shadows in some situations.
